definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: Besides, the cholesterols were purified by recrystallization.
sentences.chinese: 以乙醇爲溶劑，用重結晶方法純化膽固醇。

sentences.english: Marble, a metamorphic rock, forms when limestone re- crystallizes.
sentences.chinese: 大理岩，一種變質岩，在灰巖重結晶時形成。

sentences.english: Purification of 2,6 dichlorotoluene by the recrystallization method without solvent was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用無溶劑重結晶法提純2，6二氯甲苯。

sentences.english: The deformation and recrystallization in the shear zone are very strong.
sentences.chinese: 剪切帶內糜棱巖的塑性變形和恢復重結晶作用強烈。

sentences.english: The crude dye is collected on a filter and then recrystallized from ethanol containing a small amount of piperidine.
sentences.chinese: 粗染料過濾，然後在少量含有哌啶的乙醇中重結晶。

sentences.english: The refined wax through recrystallization leads to white crystalline wax.
sentences.chinese: 精製後的糠蠟經乙醇重結晶，還可得到白色的結晶蠟。

sentences.english: Furthermore, we discovered the recrystallization solvent for separation of the diastereomer.
sentences.chinese: 發現了分離非對映異構體的重結晶溶劑。

sentences.english: The wet filter cake was recrystallized from 650ml methanol .
sentences.chinese: 將溼的濾餅用650毫升甲醇進行重結晶。
